title: NGI Zero Commons Fund
summary: Sub-grants for open-source internet commons projects. Supports software, hardware, and standards development that contributes to an open internet. Ideal for developers building open-source tools, protocols, or infrastructure.

title: NGI Zero Core Fund
summary: Funding for projects that improve core internet technologies. Focus on security, privacy, and trustworthiness of the internet. Supports R&D on protocols, middleware, and enabling technologies.

title: EIC Accelerator
budget: Up to 2,500,000 EUR (grant) + up to 15,000,000 EUR (equity)
summary: Blended finance (grant + equity) for high-impact SMEs with breakthrough innovations. Supports scale-up of deep tech with strong market potential. Requires TRL 5-8 and clear commercialisation plan.

title: EIC Pathfinder Open
summary: Funding for visionary research exploring novel ideas for radically new technologies. Supports early-stage research (TRL 1-4) in multidisciplinary consortia. Open to any field of science or technology.

title: EIC Transition
summary: Bridges gap between research and market. Funds validation and demonstration of novel technologies (TRL 4-6). Requires results from previous EIC Pathfinder or ERC Proof of Concept projects.

title: Digital Europe Programme — AI and Data Spaces
summary: Deployment of AI solutions and European data spaces. Supports testing, validation, and deployment of AI-based tools across sectors. Focus on trustworthy AI and European data sovereignty.

title: Digital Europe Programme — Cybersecurity
summary: Strengthening EU cybersecurity capacity. Supports deployment of cybersecurity tools, threat intelligence sharing, and SOC network development. Open to organisations in the cybersecurity ecosystem.

title: Digital Europe Programme — Advanced Digital Skills
summary: Training programmes for advanced digital skills including AI, cybersecurity, and cloud computing. Funds specialised courses, bootcamps, and master programmes aligned with EU digital priorities.

title: EIT Deep Tech Talent Initiative
summary: Training programme to upskill 1 million Europeans in deep tech. Funds training providers, bootcamps, and learning programmes in areas like AI, quantum, biotech, and advanced materials.

title: EIT Digital Innovation Activities
summary: Innovation activities supporting digital transformation in Europe. Funds development and market launch of digital products and services through the EIT Digital ecosystem.

title: Single Market Programme — SME Support (ex-COSME)
summary: Competitiveness and market access support for SMEs. Funds internationalisation, clustering, and ecosystem building. Successor to the COSME programme under the Single Market Programme.

title: Erasmus+ Cooperation Partnerships
summary: Transnational cooperation projects in education and training. Supports development of innovative practices, exchange of experience, and networking between organisations across Europe.

title: Erasmus+ Small-Scale Partnerships
summary: Smaller-scale cooperation for newcomers and smaller organisations. Lower administrative burden. Ideal for first-time applicants to Erasmus+ programme.

title: LIFE Clean Energy Transition
summary: Projects supporting clean energy transition across Europe. Funds capacity building, policy reform support, and market uptake of sustainable energy solutions.

title: LIFE Environment and Resource Efficiency
summary: Demonstration and pilot projects for environmental protection and resource efficiency. Supports circular economy, waste management, water quality, and air pollution reduction.

title: CEF Digital — eDelivery and Digital Infrastructure
summary: Digital infrastructure projects of common European interest. Supports cross-border digital connectivity, 5G corridors, cloud federation, and deployment of EU digital service infrastructures.

title: Interreg Europe — Policy Learning Platform
summary: Interregional cooperation projects improving regional development policies. Partners from different EU regions collaborate on policy exchange and transfer of good practices.

title: Creative Europe — Culture Strand
summary: Transnational cultural cooperation projects. Supports cross-border circulation of artists and works, audience development, social inclusion through culture, and digitisation of cultural content.

title: Creative Europe — MEDIA Strand
summary: Support for audiovisual and media industry. Funds development, distribution, and promotion of European films, TV series, video games, and immersive content.

title: MSCA Postdoctoral Fellowships
summary: Individual research fellowships for postdoctoral researchers. Supports mobility and career development. Open to any research field. 12-24 month placement at a host institution in Europe.

title: Horizon Europe Cluster 4 — Digital, Industry and Space
summary: Collaborative R&I projects in digital and industrial technologies. Topics include AI, data, robotics, advanced manufacturing, and space. Requires consortia of at least 3 partners from 3 EU countries.

title: Horizon Europe Cluster 5 — Climate, Energy and Mobility
summary: R&I for climate-neutral and smart mobility. Topics include renewable energy, energy storage, clean transport, sustainable mobility, and climate science. Requires multi-partner consortia.

title: ERC Starting Grant
summary: Frontier research grants for early-career researchers (2-7 years post-PhD). PI-driven, any scientific field. Excellence-based evaluation. Hosted at an EU institution.

title: InvestEU — SME Window
summary: EU-backed loans and guarantees for SMEs. Not a grant — provides access to favourable financing through national banks and financial intermediaries. Reduced collateral requirements.

title: European Digital Innovation Hubs (EDIH) Network
summary: Free digital transformation support via local hubs. EDIHs offer test-before-invest services, training, access to finance advice, and ecosystem networking. No application needed — contact your local EDIH.

title: Eurostars 3
summary: R&D funding for innovative SMEs. Bottom-up — any technology, any sector. Requires partnership with at least one other Eurostars country. Fast track to market focus.

title: CERV — Citizens, Equality, Rights and Values
summary: Protecting and promoting EU rights and values. Funds projects on democratic participation, anti-discrimination, gender equality, and citizens engagement. Strong focus on civil society organisations.

title: EU4Health Programme
summary: EU health programme supporting healthcare resilience, digital health, disease prevention, and crisis preparedness. Funds cross-border health projects and strengthening of health systems.
